data.actual_result: A black box aka the keyboard shadow shows up for a second before going down.
data.expected_result: Settings look the way it was before.
data.short_description: Keyboard shadow appears for two or three seconds before disappearing after switching to an app with keyboard open in settings that does not require a keyboard input.
data.steps_to_repro: - Go into user settings. - Go into Appearance. - Switch to another app, Messages or Notes. - Open keyboard there. - Switch back to Discord. - Observe.
